name: places/ChIJOVWnaV5ZwokRlh2behEgAvg
adrFormatAddress: 2 N 6th Pl #15E, Brooklyn, NY 11249, USA

originalText.text: Rasha has been walking our pup Rocco for almost 5 years now and we've had a wonderful experience. He is reliable, trustworthy and most important our dog really has taken to him.  We couldn't be happier. If you are looking for a dog walker in Williamsburg I suggest seriously considering Rasha.

text.text: Rasha has been walking our pup Rocco for almost 5 years now and we've had a wonderful experience. He is reliable, trustworthy and most important our dog really has taken to him.  We couldn't be happier. If you are looking for a dog walker in Williamsburg I suggest seriously considering Rasha.

originalText.text:
We have been using "Walking with Sage" for almost a year now for our dog's daily walk and are thrilled with the level of promptness and professionalism. We also like that our pup walks with a small group of dogs, a manageable size so that he still gets individual attention, but can also socialize a bit.

We are a couple that travels often. We have no hesitations about using "Walking with Sage" for our dog sitting needs. Our pup has the greatest time. Our dog always comes home happy and ready to relax from his play time while with Rasha. A happy dog is a good dog! He loves Rasha so much that when we bump into him in the street our dog is absolutely ecstatic.

This is a service I would highly recommend.

originalText.text: There is a lot of trust involved in hiring a dog walker, and Rasha has earned our trust many times over. Most importantly, we trust Rasha will responsibly care for and protect our dog, Cooper. Cooper is truly part of our family, and it gives us a lot comfort to know Rasha looks out for Cooper’s well-being with the same level of care and attention he brings to caring for his own dog. Just ask Rasha about his dog, and you’ll learn this is a very high bar! We also trust Rasha will always be there and be on time. He has been impeccably reliable over the nearly three years he has helped us with Cooper. He has never missed a walk, but he also picks up and drops off with clockwork precision. We also trust Rasha will be respectful as he comes and goes from our apartment and our building. I sit on the board of our building and know there can be occasional issues with dog walkers bringing packs of dogs in and out. Rasha is always thoughtful and we have never had any issues. Last but certainly not least, Rasha has earned Cooper's trust, which is not easily done. While Cooper the sweetest pup with us, he is a very anxious dog and wary of strangers. Rasha projects that calm positive energy that is so important in putting dogs at ease. Rasha is now one of a very small group of people that Cooper greets warmly. Moreover, when Rasha has added new dog walkers to his team, he has taken great care in slowly introducing them to Cooper. We are grateful to have found Rasha and highly recommend his services.

originalText.text: We’ve been using Rasha for a few years now. He is so sweet and our dog absolutely loves him. She’s a rescue, so she isn’t incredibly trusting of others. We are sooo thankful that she loves him. He always sends updates when we are on vacation too which is nice :) highly highly recommend him. He’s professional, consistent and always on time.

text.text: We’ve been using Rasha for a few years now. He is so sweet and our dog absolutely loves him. She’s a rescue, so she isn’t incredibly trusting of others. We are sooo thankful that she loves him. He always sends updates when we are on vacation too which is nice :) highly highly recommend him. He’s professional, consistent and always on time.

originalText.text: Rasha is amazing, he's walked my french bulldog for over three years now and we adore him, and Joey too, always runs to him at the door and wags his tail. We completely trust Rasha with Joey and would be heartbroken if we had to move and find someone new. I am a crazy frenchie mom and researched/tried several options before settling down with Rasha and the main reason is because he truly cares and is responsible with our pup (doesn’t leave him alone and prioritizes safety among the pack). He does his due diligence by meeting the pet parents and really getting to know the family before saying yes. He is also super attentive in watching for Joey’s well-being and follows my instructions to perfection (cleaning, leashes, cooling vests, sweater options, etc.). He is incredible and goes above and beyond, you can definitely trust him!
